meanings.definition: The quality or state of being biconvex.
meanings.sent1: The biconvexity of the lens helps focus light properly.
meanings.sent2: The biconvexity of the glass magnifies objects when you look through it.
meanings.sent3: I tried to balance a coin on its biconvexity, but it kept rolling off.
meanings.sent4: Her smile had a biconvexity that brightened up the room.
meanings.sent5: The biconvexity of the mirror made my reflection appear larger than life.

meanings.definition: The property of having two convex surfaces.
meanings.sent1: The biconvexity of the tablet makes it easier to hold.
meanings.sent2: The biconvexity of the contact lens ensures a comfortable fit on the eye.
meanings.sent3: The biconvexity of the bread slice made it perfect for sandwich making.
meanings.sent4: The biconvexity of the hill made it challenging to climb.
meanings.sent5: The biconvexity of the balloon allowed it to float gracefully in the air.
